title: Problem logging in
body: I was just trying to play a game on 5/23/2017 it worked for one game and than when i try to get into another one it crashed in loading screen. While this usually happens and i can just fix it by running as a administrator and it would work but this time it say that my username and password was wrong it doesn't work with anyone account or any of my accounts it work on the page, but it doesn't work on the client.

replies.body: This login error is an issue we've been [tracking](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Oe3XBf34-incorrect-username-or-password), and caused by a mismatched patch.  If restarting the client doesn't update you to the current version, download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to perform a force repatch.  I hope that helps!
